hits.name: Future Fields
hits.long_description:
We make the most important ingredient for lab grown meat - cell growth media. We make cell growth media 1000 times cheaper than anyone else through our novel production system.

Future Fields started out as a lab grown meat company, focusing on chicken products. We developed our first prototype using cell culture media available on the market today. With this, the price of our chicken was $3000 US per lb. Would you buy a really good chicken nugget for $300? Probably not. 

We prioritized overcoming this hurdle first, and we were successful! We developed an entirely new way of producing growth factors - which are the key (and most expensive) component of cell culture media. We realized this technology could solve the same problem all lab grown meat companies face. 

Given our mission to singlehandedly kickstart the next agricultural revolution, we decided to pivot and focus on enabling the entire industry to succeed. Our cell culture media is affordable, scalable, and fully customizable to meet the specific needs of individual cell lines, from pork to kangaroo, and everything in between.
hits.one_liner: Cell growth media for lab grown meat

hits.name: ChatPay
hits.location: Belo Horizonte - State of Minas Gerais, Brazil
hits.long_description:
Chatpay allows anyone to create an online coaching business through WhatsApp or Telegram groups. For example a fitness coach can charge her audience to join an exclusive group where she will run an entire weight loss fitness program.

Covid killed lots of jobs and brought the need for people to reinvent themselves. This accelerated a larger trend of individuals building and charging their audience directly. Our top coach left her job as a lawyer and it's making $300k per year with her groups in Brazil

ChatPay is set to be the largest enabler of this new behavior because we are the only one reaching normal people where they actually are - on messenger apps. Chat wins over long-format content and has better engagement which makes it easier to become mainstream.

hits.long_description:
Once creates mobile optimized storefronts for Shopify.

2 things to know about the e-commerce space: mobile traffic is now the majority of all e-commerce traffic, but mobile conversion rates are 50% lower than desktop.

This is because all of the e-commerce platforms that have reached scale are built desktop first.

At Once we’ve solved this by copying a design that’s already proven to work on mobile: the Instagram story. We give Shopify sellers a mobile storefront that looks and feels like a story.

hits.name: Nestybox
hits.long_description:
Nestybox creates software that enables Linux containers to act like virtual machines. This increases the use cases for containers and gives enterprises a less expensive and more flexible alternative to virtual machines in many scenarios. 

Our first product is a "container runtime", the software that creates the containers. It's called "Sysbox" and integrates with the popular Docker and Kubernetes engines, enabling these tools to deploy containers that act like virtual machines. 

This technology provides software engineers with an alternative to VMs, one that easier to use, much more efficiency, and easily migrated across clouds.

Hacker News Launch: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=24084758
hits.one_liner: Enables Linux containers to act as super fast & efficient VMs

hits.name: Lendtable
hits.long_description:
1 in 4 Americans do not get their full 401(k) match. That means 25 million workers are leaving $24 billion on the table in free employer contributions. The primary reason these workers cannot get their match is because they do not have enough to both cover living expenses and invest. 

Lendtable helps workers get thousands in additional income by giving them a cash advance to cover their living expenses so they can finally begin earning their employer match. Once their money has vested we take some of the match money earned in order to cover our expenses. 

Workers now have thousands of dollars more without putting any money down, and we make money helping them do so -- we win if they win.
hits.one_liner: We give employees wealth-building loans for their 401k match and ESPP

1 in 4 Americans do not get their full 401(k) match. That means 25 million workers are leaving $24 billion on the table in free employer contributions. The primary reason these workers cannot get their match is because they do not have enough to both cover living expenses and invest. 

Lendtable helps workers get thousands in additional income by giving them a cash advance to cover their living expenses so they can finally begin earning their employer match. Once their money has vested we take some of the match money earned in order to cover our expenses. 

Workers now have thousands of dollars more without putting any money down, and we make money helping them do so -- we win if they win.

one_liner.value: We give employees wealth-building loans for their 401k match and ESPP

hits.name: Ready
hits.long_description:
Ready builds software tools that help local internet service providers connect more people to better broadband services. Local ISPs connect more than 50 million U.S. homes to the internet today, but their businesses typically run on a mess of legacy systems, and as a result, they struggle to work effectively, and usually fail to deliver great subscriber experience.

With Ready, local ISPs get everything they need to deliver seamless subscriber experience – from finding & signing prospects in their geographic area, to onboarding and billing, to integrations with legacy data systems – all in one place.

If you’re a talented engineer looking for meaningful, rewarding experience, there are many reasons to consider joining Ready for your next chapter, including:
* **Constant engagement**: large product surface area means there’s never a shortage of interesting, challenging, meaningful problems to solve.
* Team motto is “**builders building**”: We strongly prefer shipping results to customers over heavy processes and lots of meetings.
* Experienced founders and a culture of sharing mean there are plenty of opportunities to **learn all about building startups**, not just coding.
* Aspects of the product are customer-facing enterprise tools, other aspects face the subscriber, a rare combo of **B2B** and **B2B2C**.
* **Remote team**: work anywhere you want, as long as you get strong internet (and the platform we’re making helps make that true in more places).
* We’re well funded, and place strong emphasis on **revenue from customers** – our ambition is to build a large and important company with many options down the road and **minimal dilution** along the way.
hits.one_liner: Software that helps ISPs connect more people to better broadband.

hits.name: Skio
hits.long_description:
Skio (skio.com) helps brands on Shopify sell subscriptions without ripping their hair out.

Customers include Bev (drinkbev.com), MatchaBar (matchabar.co), Muddy Bites (muddybites.com), Stryx (stryx.com), Doe Lashes (doelashes.com), Barukas (barukas.com), Red Bay Coffee (redbaycoffee.com), & Remedy Organics (remedyorganics.com).

We've raised $3.7m from investors like Y Combinator (ycombinator.com), Adjacent (Nico Wittenborn), James Beshara (Magic Mind, @jamesbeshara), Jeremy Cai (Italic, @jjeremycai), Daniel Rutberg/Moody Nashawaty (Mutesix), Shaan Puri (My First Million, @ShaanVP), Julian Shapiro (Demand Curve, @julian), Roman Khan (Linjer, Raycon), Paul Michaux (Prose), Kevin Lee (immi, @kevinleeme), Geoff Miles (Bev), Kal Freese (Taika), Mike Rossi (Smile.io), Lauren Jarvis (Literati), Maneet Khaira (Backbone), Adrian Alfieri (@adrianalfieri), Grace Clarke (@graceclarke), Sahil Bloom (@SahilBloom), Alex Whatley (Cresicor), Jeff Chang (Growth Advisor, @JeffChang30), Mike Angell (Carted), Roland Cassirer/Ryan Brennan/Phil Kramer (Orchard Analytics), Yunyu Lin/Rahul Sengottuvelu (Cohere), & many D2C angels.

We do better than current solutions through native Shopify checkout (increased conversions with PayPal option, no duplicate products, no checkout.rechargeapps.com url, no separate refunding), passwordless login (customer tickets around login solved), 10x faster subscription editing, a ready-to-go headless subscription portal (instant loads), group subscription discounts (referrals 2.0), and an easy migration from ReCharge (no payment method updates needed).

The company is founded by Kennan Davison (linkedin.com/in/kennandavison), an ex-Pinterest growth engineer & college dropout.

hits.long_description:
ML models are only as good as the datasets they're trained on, and that means that most improvement to model performance comes from improvement to the quality and diversity of their datasets.

Our tooling makes it easy for ML teams to find anomalies + failure patterns in their datasets and fix these problems by editing / adding the right data. So the next time you retrain your model, it just gets better.

hits.name: Decentro
hits.long_description:
Almost every company that has to integrate with the legacy financial institutions, faces several challenges when it comes to the product cycle. Not only are the APIs and documentations less available, but they are also old school and ridden with errors and loopholes. 

On top of that, the lack of a single point of contact from the underlying institutions, makes the already long integration cycle of 5 months feel like a temple run between different departments. And since those services break and update over time, you can imagine the nightmare in terms of coordination between the tech teams. 

We are a full-stack platform where you can come, select your desired modules, play in the sandbox, and launch your product with the APIs and SDKs within a couple of weeks! Not only that, but we also take care of all upcoming fixes, iterations, and updates without breaking any flow.

It's that easy, as it should be. Welcome to the future.
hits.one_liner: API platform for banking integrations (Plaid for India and APAC)
hits.subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design

hits.name: Biocogniv
hits.long_description:
More than a decade since the HITECH Act established a timeline for EHR adoption, US hospitals today find themselves generating more clinical and administrative data on any given day than previously thought possible. Yet clinical operations are still based on subjective decision-making and traditional processes that ignore not only the raw data, but also the valuable efficiency improvements that can be automatically derived from them.

Biocogniv picks up where the EHR transformation left off and introduces real-time intelligence on top of this vast backdrop of data, to improve the quality, cost, and ultimately access to care in US health systems.
hits.one_liner: Real-time AI for hospitals

hits.name: Osmind
hits.long_description: There are 22M+ Americans who suffer from treatment-resistant mental health conditions, meaning they’ve failed two or more conventional treatments. Our mission is to further innovative mental treatments (ranging from FDA-approved psychedelic medicine to neuromodulation) for those who are suffering the most. We do this by empowering providers, improving patient care, and accelerating research. Our software is used by mental health doctors and their patients. We analyze multimodal data from the software to help the doctors deliver better care and also offer insights to help research and development of new treatments that actually work. Together, we can usher in the mental health revolution and help solve our world's mental health crisis.

hits.name: MarketForce
hits.long_description:
MarketForce empowers consumer brands to manage their field sales activities and grow their distribution channels in Africa, and other emerging markets. 

We enable informal merchants to source, order and pay for inventory at any time via interactive SMS and mobile app, and get it delivered within hours. We also empower them to collect digital payments and make extra money by reselling digital financial services such as airtime, electricity tokens and bill payments.

Most companies have all the data they need to figure this out, but it’s often locked away in 20 different systems. There is no central place for an account manager to easily prioritize which customers to focus on and what actions to take to help them. Workbase is the solution, by one-click integrating the data sources and customizing the interface and actions for each company.

When working on similar internal tools at companies like Segment, we saw first-hand that proactively managing the customer journey could increase net retained revenue by as much as 20 percent.

hits.name: CoreCare
hits.long_description:
Getting paid in healthcare is hard. Healthcare providers contract with numerous payors, all of which have their own systems and processes for authorizing payment. Worse, payor systems don't communicate with provider EMRs, so providers are forced to do a lot of manual work between them to get paid. This results in providers spending $300 Billion a year to get paid, and ultimately collect less money than what they are owed.

CoreCare aggregates administrative patient data from all systems providers work with (EHR, Gov, Payer), standardizes it in our Enterprise Data Warehouse and creates a single net view of administrative patient data for the provider. Then we add workflow automations (according to client specifications) to eliminate the manual work providers are forced to do to get paid.
hits.one_liner: Making it easy for healthcare providers to collect payments using…

Volopay completely eliminates the need for expense reports and reimbursements while giving everyone in the company a card to use. hits.name: Hypermile
hits.long_description:
We are making long haul trucking safer and more fuel efficient by developing an AI-powered Advanced Driver Assistance System (AIDAS). The system includes camera hardware mounted to the vehicle and a processing unit that can control the vehicle's brake, throttle and steering while under the supervision of a driver, augmenting their skills but not replacing them. 

Our key insight is that there is a 30% difference in fuel efficiency between the best and worst truck drivers. By training our AI ADAS system how to drive from data provided by the best drivers, the AIDAS can improve the efficiency of all drivers.

hits.name: SuperTokens
hits.long_description:
SuperTokens is building open source authentication (as an alternative to Auth0, Firebase and AWS Cognito). Add secure, hassle free authentication to your app in 1 day. We enable startups to launch quicker and focus on their core product offering

1. We're easier to implement as we take a modular approach - making it possible to pick only the features you need for your use case. This means you need not worry about complications associated with other features (eg: SSO and OAuth if you don’t need it) and this in turn makes it easier to implement and manage SuperTokens.
2. Developer's can own and manage their user's data. 
3. SuperTokens can be run on your premise for free and also has a generous hosted tier for those who dont want to manage it themselves.

SuperTokens is being used by hundreds of developers across the globe.
hits.one_liner: Open source alternative to Auth0 / AWS Cognito / Firebase Auth

hits.name: Jeeves
hits.long_description:
Jeeves provides startups in Mexico, Canada, Colombia, Chile, UK and Europe with a true international corporate credit card, upto 4% cashback, no personal guarantee required and built in ability to pay SPEI in Mexico and EFT/e-transfer in Canada.

If you are operating a startup internationally and using a USD card, you pay 1-2% on every transaction -- this is automatically added by MasterCard, Amex and Visa. Jeeves eliminates those fees and you can pay us back directly in your local currency -- MXN, CAD, GBP, EUR, reducing your FX fees significantly and making your month end expense management process more efficient.

We can sign up non US entities as well as US entities. So if you are operating only in Mexico, Canada, UK or Europe, you can still sign up for Jeeves (no US entity required).

Additional benefits include:
* No personal guarantee required to sign up.
* Pay us back in your local currency -- MXN, CAD, GBP, EUR.
* Can sign up non US entities.
* No FX fees (vs. using Amex or another US card for international purchases).
* Pay for non card transactions directly with the app -- this includes the ability to pay for SPEI in Mexico and EFT/e-transfer in Canada (coming soon).

Save your accounting and finance team 10+ hours a week and:
* Start spending without any transfer of funds (we put the cash up for you).
* 5-10x higher limits than Amex.
* Free built in expense management tools.
* Unlimited virtual cards for your entire team.
* 1% cashback on spend up to $20K and 2% above it.

We are live with more than 1000 companies - including a large YC contingent. Join us today!
hits.one_liner: International banking infrastructure for global startups.

We are making a new fertility treatment that infertile couples can order with a click of a
button to help them conceive at home. Our technology increases the likelihood of pregnancy by guiding significantly higher number of sperms towards the ovum using a proprietary combination of surface features and microenvironment optimization.

The fertility treatments available today, such as in-vitro fertilization (IVF) and intra-uterine
insemination (IUI), are psychologically and financially draining and come with considerable treatment-associated risks. Furthermore, over 25 million women of reproductive age in the US
have limited nearby access to fertility treatment.

hits.name: PhotoRoom
hits.long_description:
PhotoRoom provides photo editing software powerful enough to create outstanding images yet simple enough to be used without any training. We leverage deep learning to translate pixels into objects, drastically simplifying non-creative tasks such as removing backgrounds from images.

Our mission: enable entrepreneurs and small businesses to compose images that stand out.

Founded by Matthieu Rouif (10 years of experience in mobile apps, built apps used by 100+ million users) and Eliot Andres (4 years of experience in large-scale computer vision), PhotoRoom was selected by Y Combinator in 2020. Talented engineers, designers and marketers have joined the team since then, coming from Apple, Algolia or Google among others.

Today, PhotoRoom is profitable and is used by more than 5 millions of users every month. We improve our product and our technology with the support of world-class experts in the field like Yann LeCun, Roxanne Varza or Holger Seim. PhotoRoom was featured by Apple as one of the most innovative photo apps in recent years.

As a small tight-knit team, our priorities are impact and iteration speed. We ship new versions every week and talk to our users daily. There is nothing we enjoy more than working side-by-side with another team member to improve our users' experience.
hits.one_liner: Automatically removes background & get amazing marketing images on iOS

hits.name: Trident Bioscience
hits.long_description: Trident Bioscience builds tools to expedite the discovery and optimization of useful proteins. Our technology first applies predictive models of protein structure and function to generate sets of potentially active protein sequences. We then apply our state-of-the-art sequence optimization algorithm to design gene libraries capable of testing these candidates extremely quickly and affordably. By combining these technologies, we're closing the design-build-test loop of protein optimization and cutting the total cycle time to help bring synthetic proteins to market faster than ever before.
hits.one_liner: Accelerating protein engineering.

Most businesses are consistently under- or over-staffed, which either damages customer experience or leaves money on the table (by unnecessarily increasing staffing costs). Granular, high-accuracy demand forecasting solves this issue by allowing businesses to align resources to exactly meet demand. 
Our demand forecasting as a service, brings simplicity & precision to this often complex and error-prone process, and quickly provides business users the right answers to run their operations.
hits.one_liner: Demand Forecasting as a Service

hits.name: RTCanary
hits.long_description: WebRTC is the reason we’ve stayed connected and productive during the COVID era, powering most of the browser-based video communications platforms you use every day (Google Meet, Facebook Messenger, etc.). But when a call gets dropped or the audio cuts out, it’s hard for the video developers to understand why it happened. This is a major problem for new players in the video chat industry that lose customers because of call quality issues; customers should be able to use video platforms with the features they want without having to sacrifice call quality.
hits.one_liner: We are a monitoring and analytics plugin for all video chat platforms.
